author: dkhaywood
msg: [the previous commit also included suppressing toDefault for @Optional properties];   more on... adding MetaModelValidator and SpecificationTraverser subcomponents to the reflector, with default implementations that implement the same functionality as was originally inlined within NakedObjectReflectorAbstract and JavaIntrospector; this is being added to simplify the Jpa object store which does post-processing of the metamodel for the JPA entities ... really such validation is something that has an extended programming model

author: dkhaywood
msg: adding MetaModelValidator and SpecificationTraverser subcomponents to the reflector, with default implementations that implement the same functionality as was originally inlined within NakedObjectReflectorAbstract and JavaIntrospector; this is being added to simplify the Jpa object store which does post-processing of the metamodel for the JPA entities ... really such validation is something that has an extended programming model
